lines: Necessary instructions regarding filling up of online
applications
1. Candidates are required to apply online through BSF website. No other means/ mode of
application will be accepted.
2. Applicants are first required to go to the BSF website www.bsf.gov.in and register themselves
by filling one-time profile or required to fill their complete information step by step. This is one-
time profile which candidates need to fill and it will be useful to candidates for all subsequent
advertisements of Border Security Force.
3. Candidates are required to have a valid Email ID and Mobile Number for registering and
creating profile.
5. Candidate should carefully fill all the information as asked in Profile and SAVE it. (save button) 6. All the candidate are required to upload the images of recent photograph, signature and
Thumb Impression.
Size of the photograph (passport size) (Max size—50 KB)
Size of the signature (Max size-50 KB)

Size of the Thumb Impression (Max size—50 KB) Other supportive document (Max size—50 KB) o 000 7. No Fee will be Charged for filling up the OTR (One-Time Profile). 8. After login with credentials, candidates can see active advertisements under Online
Application Link. ‘Click Here to apply’ link is available next to active advertisements after login.
9. Candidate need to click on ‘Click Here to apply’ link to apply for the post advertisement. 10. On clicking on ‘Click Here to apply’ link, system checks candidate’s eligibility with respect to
eligibility criteria required for the advertisement. If candidate does not fulfil eligibility, appropriate
message of ineligibility is displayed by system.

11. Only the applications of candidate fulfilling eligibility conditions will be accepted by system. 12. Candidates must ensure all relevant fields in the application are filled before final submission,
since editing after final submission will not be possible.
13. Candidate's application will not be considered if fee is not paid for that application in the
application categories. Female candidate / Ex-serviceman / SC/ ST candidates not valid to
submit any examination fee.
extracted_text.full_text:
Necessary instructions regarding filling up of online
applications
1. Candidates are required to apply online through BSF website. No other means/ mode of
application will be accepted.
2. Applicants are first required to go to the BSF website www.bsf.gov.in and register themselves
by filling one-time profile or required to fill their complete information step by step. This is one-
time profile which candidates need to fill and it will be useful to candidates for all subsequent
advertisements of Border Security Force.
3. Candidates are required to have a valid Email ID and Mobile Number for registering and
creating profile.
5. Candidate should carefully fill all the information as asked in Profile and SAVE it. (save button) 6. All the candidate are required to upload the images of recent photograph, signature and
Thumb Impression.
Size of the photograph (passport size) (Max size—50 KB)
Size of the signature (Max size-50 KB)
Size of the Thumb Impression (Max size—50 KB) Other supportive document (Max size—50 KB) o 000 7. No Fee will be Charged for filling up the OTR (One-Time Profile). 8. After login with credentials, candidates can see active advertisements under Online
Application Link. ‘Click Here to apply’ link is available next to active advertisements after login.
9. Candidate need to click on ‘Click Here to apply’ link to apply for the post advertisement. 10. On clicking on ‘Click Here to apply’ link, system checks candidate’s eligibility with respect to
eligibility criteria required for the advertisement. If candidate does not fulfil eligibility, appropriate
message of ineligibility is displayed by system.
11. Only the applications of candidate fulfilling eligibility conditions will be accepted by system. 12. Candidates must ensure all relevant fields in the application are filled before final submission,
since editing after final submission will not be possible.
13. Candidate's application will not be considered if fee is not paid for that application in the
application categories. Female candidate / Ex-serviceman / SC/ ST candidates not valid to
submit any examination fee.
